${modID}:Eitheiruiung.NAME: Eitheiruiung
${modID}:Eitheiruiung.FLAVOR: The "Staff of Balance", formed to channel an endless amount of magic from the Tree of Life.

${modID}:FlowCompass.NAME: Flow Compass
${modID}:FlowCompass.FLAVOR: A glass sphere and a black needle move in 3D space, tracing out the harmonics of magic.

${modID}:TomeOfTheUnknowable.NAME: Tome of the Unknowable
${modID}:TomeOfTheUnknowable.FLAVOR: A nondescript book that holds the secrets of the world and wishes to share.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, add two random cards to your hand.

${modID}:KeyOfDestinies.NAME: Key of Destinies
${modID}:KeyOfDestinies.FLAVOR: A wrought-iron key that controls destiny.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, #yScry

${modID}:Shadowrend.NAME: Shadowrend
${modID}:Shadowrend.FLAVOR: A blade that devours even the soul of its wielder.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you deal unblocked damage, gain #b1 temporary #yStrength.

${modID}:PeaceBranch.NAME: Peace Branch
${modID}:PeaceBranch.FLAVOR: A stick formed from the resolution of a great conflict.
DESCRIPTIONS: When an enemy dies, prevent the next time you would lose HP this combat.

${modID}:BandOfStableTime.NAME: Band of Stable Time
${modID}:BandOfStableTime.FLAVOR: A platinum bracelet that prevents timelines from splitting in its vicinity.
DESCRIPTIONS: You get #b1 #y${modID}:Constellation at the start of combat. When you are dealt damage, get #b1 #yBlock for each #y${modID}:Constellation you have.
